titles.title: CB 114 Blessed is the Name of Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
BLESSED IS THE NAME OF JESUS.
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
Blessed is the name of Jesus.
Hallelujah, evermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He has died for our salvation,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
He has died for our salvation.
Hallelujah, evermore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He arose again on the third day,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
He arose again on the third day,
Hallelujah, evermore.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He ascended into heaven,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
He ascended into heaven,
Hallelujah, evermore.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He sent us the Holy Spirit,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
He sent us the Holy Spirit,
Hallelujah, evermore.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
He is coming back again,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord.
He is coming back again,
Hallelujah, evermore.
